report.title: Kitty Heaven
report.author: Projekt Skunkjar
report.bodytext: Made tea from 7 1.5' catnip flowers, 1 Tsp ful of ground ginger, /n 1 Tsp fresh clover honey. Here is the report. /n /n T+ 5 min: Tastes like real strong mint tea. I like it. /n /n T+ 12: Smoke 1 cig (aprox 1 gm) catnip flower, tastes a lot like the tea, quite minty and tasty! Aprox 1/2 done with Joint, I feel more relaxed. Could this really be working??!! /n /n T+ 20: About 1/2 tea left, heavy menthol flavor. Not at all trippy, but certainly slows mental processes. I did smoke aprox 2 gm of Beasters (commercial, Cansdian hydro buds) throughout the day, unsure if this is like a rebuzz, or something wholly different. /n /n T+ 40: Still not baseline, Try More tea, only stronger. /n /n T+ 1.10: Just finished second cup of tea, no ginger this time. Again I used the same amount of catnip, but I boiled it instead of steeping it, to the same effect. Time seems to go a bit faster, whilst remaining very relaxed. The real strong flavor in the first cup was the ginger, which had seemingly no effect other than flavor. /n /n T+ 2.20: Smoke 3 more hits of Beasters, reach expected high. About to smoke another J of catnip (deseeded this time). Joint adds another dimension to my stone. Taste of catnip is much more pallatable w/o seeds! /n /n Overall, there is a nice but very mild sedative/depressant effect to catnip.
